name: Ranger
desc: A warrior who combats threats on the edges of civilization
coolFeatures: ** As a note, the Ranger class is known for being kind of "weak" in 5e. To fix this, WoTC has put out a new alternative class for the ranger in order to balance their power. Let your DM know if you want to play this alternative class.
Great at survival, exploration, and hunting
Can cast some druidic and nature spells
Can hide and hunt easier in nature
Ranger archetypes include: Beast Master, Fey Wanderer, Gloom Stalker, Horizon Walker, Hunter, Monster Slayer, and Swarmkeeper
